title: Please note that LIHKG is merely one of the many hubs

replies.msg:
Lihkg has been infiltrated throughly by the CCP.
Please take everything here with a grain of salt.
Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Reddit are also platforms where protesters and pro-Freedom Hongkongers are using.

You wont miss much even if you don't understand Cantonese.
We are all in this together.

FIGHT FOR FREEDOM!
STAND WITH HONG KONG!

We are temporarily using live channel直播台as english channel
https://lih.kg/1634498

Hong Kong’s human rights problem is just the tip of the iceberg. Other regions in China like Xinjiang, Xizang are suffering from the same problem. So this is not just about we Hong Kong people voicing out for ourselves, at the same time it is also us voicing out for the people like us in China who were hit by the police force as they voice out for their culture, religion and their basic human rights. We ALL connect.
Not only were these people hit by police force, many are killed, captured and tortured in jails

If you speak English or even other languages, feel free to share information from this platform to other social media to arouse for more attention from the media around the world. Since the government is trying to keep our voices from being heard by the outside world, we really need your help in sharing all these to people around you. Media coverage is very important since the PRC government is making up stories in attempt to cover up the human rights disaster that has actually happened in Hk.

quote.msg: Not only were these people hit by police force, many are killed, captured and tortured in jails
